thread.title: A guide to 2017 college deadlines (and 2018, too)
thread.title_full: A guide to 2017 college deadlines (and 2018, too)

author: USATODAY College
title: A guide to 2017 college deadlines (and 2018, too)
text: Take a break, find a summer internship, or begin preparing for Fall 2017! August Course registration for Fall 2017 closes Buy or sell textbooks for Fall 2017 Fall 2017 semester begins Graduation application for Fall 2017 opens: Order your cap, gown, tassel, and any necessary stoles, chords, or medallions after your application for graduation is approved. Take the GRE exam Undergrad students planning to study abroad: apply for Asia Exchange Scholarships October 2018 – 2019 FASFA opens : For the 2018 – 2019 FAFSA, apply between October 1, 2017 and June 30, 2019. Begin applying to colleges for the Fall 2018 semester Take midterms — begin studying two weeks prior to exam Apply for Spring 2018 internships Graduation application for Fall 2017 closes November Course registration for Spring 2018 semester opens Thanksgiving Break December Begin applying to colleges for the Spring 2018 semester Take final exams — Signet Education recommends to start studying for final exams 2 to 3 weeks before their scheduled date. Fall 2017 semester ends Retake the GRE exam if you wish to improve your score Apply to graduate schools for Fall 2018 2018 Finalize college applications for the Fall 2018 semester Apply for housing and meal plan Begin applying for scholarships Course registration for Spring 2018 semester ends Buy or sell textbooks for Spring 2018 Spring 2018 semester begins Graduation application for Spring 2018 opens: Order your cap, gown, tassel, and any necessary stoles, chords, or medallions after your application for graduation is approved. February Grad students planning to study abroad: apply for the Boren Scholarship March Take midterms — begin studying two weeks prior to exam Apply for summer internships 2018 Spring Break: find out how to save money during Spring Break here . Graduation application for Spring 2018 closes
